column49: the bucketing code assumes that tables declared as being bucketed actually have the correct file layout in hdfs `hivesplititerable` currently walks the directly structure as normal when bucketing is enabled and skips any files that dont match the bucket file it should do this instead:- verify that the directory has exactly the right number of files- verify that the directory has no subdirectories- if all checks pass return splits for the bucket file- otherwise ignore bucketing and return splits for all files as normalthe bucket file is determined by sorting the filenames lexicographically and returning the nth file
